org.apache.fop.fo.properties

Interface CommonAccessibilityHolder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGraphics, AbstractListItemPart, AbstractPageNumberCitation, AbstractPageSequence, BasicLink, BidiOverride, Block, Bookmark, BookmarkTitle, ExternalDocument, ExternalGraphic, Flow, Footnote, FootnoteBody, InitialPropertySet, Inline, InlineLevel, InstreamForeignObject, Leader, ListBlock, ListItem, ListItemBody, ListItemLabel, PageNumber, PageNumberCitation, PageNumberCitationLast, PageSequence, Root, StaticContent, Table, TableAndCaption, TableBody, TableCaption, TableCell, TableCellContainer, TableFooter, TableHeader, TablePart, TableRow, Title, Wrapper

    public interface CommonAccessibilityHolder
    Classes that implement this interface support the common accessibility properties.
    See Also:
    CommonAccessibility
